description: Defines a Flutter widget class 'TvFocusRing' that provides visual focus, hover, and press effects such as glow, outline, and scale for TV interface components. It is a stateless widget that wraps a child widget, adding optional animated effects based on user interactions.

classes.name: TvFocusRing
classes.description: A Flutter widget that applies focus, hover, and press visual effects to a child widget, used primarily in TV interfaces.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the focus ring, applying scale, glow, border, and background effects based on focus, hover, and press states.
